title: Weatherstrip for Front Roof Frame, Replace

steps.text: Remove soft top or hard top

substeps.text: Cut back head of 2x plastic retainer (2) flush with front roof

steps.text: Remove all traces of adhesive residue
Apply masking tape to front roof frame on both top corners adjacent to soft top or hard top mounting brackets

substeps.text: Apply tape 200 mm each side of mounting bracket

steps.text: Locate new weatherstrip and temporarily tape in position
Install soft top or hard top
Position weatherstrip to optimum sealing position

substeps.text: Mark position on previously applied masking tape

steps.text: Remove soft top or hard top
Punch 2x 5 mm hole in weatherstrip for 2x plastic retainer Note: Punch holes should not conflict with position of old plastic retainers.
Partially remove protective tape from weatherstrip

substeps.text: Remove protective tape from S section (1) on left side and
Align weatherstrip to previously marked position and apply

steps.text: Secure weatherstrip to front roof frame between 2x soft top or hard top mounting brackets

substeps.text: Remove protective tape, position weatherstrip then apply
Align front weatherstrip (1) with rear weatherstrip (2)
Remove protective tape, position weatherstrip then apply

steps.text: Apply recommended adhesive sealant between front roof frame (1) and weatherstrip (2) Note: Apply adhesive sealant along seam where arrowed.

substeps.text: Note position of 2x hole in weatherstrip
Drill to maximum depth of 8 mm
Apply recommended adhesive sealant to 2x hole

steps.text: Apply pressure evenly to weatherstrip, then allow to cure for a minimum of two hours
Install soft top or hard top

notes:
Cut back head of 2x plastic retainer (2) flush with front roof
frame on left side and right side
 Visibly mark
position of 2x plastic retainer for later reference.

Apply tape 200 mm each side of mounting bracket
 This is for
marking optimum position of weatherstrip location.

Punch 2x 5 mm hole in weatherstrip for 2x plastic retainer
 Punch holes
should not conflict with position of old plastic retainers.

Apply recommended adhesive sealant between front roof frame (1)
and weatherstrip (2)
 Apply adhesive
sealant along seam where arrowed.
